title: Soraka skin

embed.description: I thought it would be cool to make a mysterious, elegant skin for Raka. I used a similar color palette from the Midnight Ahri skin. Midnight Soraka skin concept

body: I would like to see Soraka come out with a legendary or ultimate skin and I know Program Soraka is fairly new but a newer dark themed skin for her would be nice to see (other than Reaper). **I TAKE NO CREDIT FOR THE ARTWORK** (Midnight Soraka is the name of the artwork)

replies.body: I love it, so pretty. I think Reaper Soraka might have the dark skin covered though?

Reaper is an alternate reality skin, like Blackfrost Anivia being corrupted by black ice. Midnight Soraka isn't corrupted or anything she's just closer to a moon theme. It's kind of like saying Lunar Goddess Diana is evil or close to a reaper theme.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Poopybunghole,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TnjI5EyI,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-06-07T19:25:55.595+0000)
>
> Reaper is an alternate reality skin, like Blackfrost Anivia being corrupted by black ice. Midnight Soraka isn't corrupted or anything she's just closer with to a moon theme. It's kind of like saying Lunar Goddess Diana is evil or close to a reaper theme.

Yes, exactly. I agree. That's why I said what I did. :D
I think he just means the scheme is too similar

Yea, that was my first thought too, and cant really just change it to a light type skin either, cause she has one of those too.

Then theres and earth-like druidish one too... options are actually kinda low on her aren't they?
Make a soul stealer Soraka at the 1820 level.
Yes... This is amazing. great job and thank you!

OH OH OH...

What if this was a UNIQUE Lunar Princess Skin?? :D
I like this very much.
I like it and I do find the aesthetics to be quite different enough compared to her reaper skin. I think perhaps changing her hairstyle might differentiate it more from reaper but that's just me.

I've always loved this concept. Its dark but also she appears to be neutral. Chaotic neutral I suppose. I'd definitely want her to have a very similar skin to this one, where she has wings and she appears to be like a dark fairy/pixie.

> [{quoted}](name=UnlovableLove,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TnjI5EyI,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-06-07T22:57:04.503+0000)
>
> I've always loved this concept. Its dark but also she appears to be neutral. Chaotic neutral I suppose. I'd definitely want her to have a very similar skin to this one, where she has wings and she appears to be like a dark fairy/pixie.

Agreed. :)

Such gorgeous, such beauty.

I want. Rito pls.
Damn, that's gorgeous. It's a lot different from Reaper Soraka, so I don't see a problem with having a skin like this added to the game.

I think that divine soraka Is a concept that could be used again but better. Is kind of wasted on a 975 skin. Would be cool to see an amazing Legendary>ultimate skin for her using this theme to justify all her effects.

Celestial Godness Soraka could be a good name too.
I want this.

i want another joking theme for soraka like pool party and another dark theme like Reaper. I want raka to get the next Ult skin for the supports since she is one of the oldest i mean thats got to count for something right?
Tyrande! :D
such night elf, wow
yes
Dark, but not really evil...... I like it.
